courseDetails.title: Build a RESTful API using SpringBoot 3 & MySQL From Scratch
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn to Build Robust and Scalable Applications with Spring Boot 3 - No Prior Experience Required!
targetAudiences: This course is specifically designed for beginner developers who are interested in pursuing server-side (backend) development. It provides a comprehensive introduction to the Spring Boot 3 framework and covers the fundamental concepts required to build robust and scalable backend applications. You will learn how to set up your development environment, create basic projects, and work with key Spring Boot concepts such as dependency injection, auto-configuration, and testing. Additionally, you'll gain hands-on experience building RESTful web services, working with databases, and securing your applications using Spring Security. By the end of this course, you'll have the foundational knowledge and skills needed to build backend applications with Spring Boot 3, making it an excellent starting point for those new to server-side development.
